rows.label: qst002001_msg001
rows.name: Request

rows.label: qst002001_msg002
rows.name: Please bring it to me quickly, mo.

rows.label: qst002001_msg003
rows.name: Thank you very much.

rows.label: qst002001_msg0001
rows.name: Nooo! What am I supposed to do?!

rows.label: qst002001_msg0002
rows.name:
At this rate, I won't be able
to face her when she's gone!

rows.label: qst002001_msg0003
rows.name:
Is there no kind young
person who will lend a hand
to this pitiful old man?!

rows.label: qst002001_msg0004
rows.name:
...Oh! You look like you're
confident in your skills.

rows.label: qst002001_msg0005
rows.name:
Please, think of it as helping
an old man with not long to live,
and listen to my request.

rows.label: qst002001_msg0006
rows.name:
The truth is, a memento was
stolen from me by a monster!

rows.label: qst002001_msg0007
rows.name:
I came here for my morning walk,
as I do every day, when I was
suddenly attacked from behind...

rows.label: qst002001_msg0008
rows.name:
It all happened so fast, I
have no idea what kind of
monster it was or where it went.

rows.label: qst002001_msg0009
rows.name:
That was a precious memento that
she wore until the very end.

rows.label: qst002001_msg0010
rows.name:
I want to go get it back, but
my old body is too weak. I need
you to get it back for me.

rows.label: qst002001_msg0011
rows.name:
Oh! You'll get it back for me?
What a kind young person!

rows.label: qst002001_msg0012
rows.name:
As I said, I have no idea what
kind of monster stole it.

rows.label: qst002001_msg0013
rows.name:
If you look around, you
might find some clues...

rows.label: qst002001_msg0014
rows.name: I'm counting on you!

rows.label: qst002001_msg0101
rows.name:
I was attacked near the Village
Guardian. If you look around there,
you might find something...

rows.label: qst002001_msg0103
rows.name:
I was attacked near the stairs.
If you look around there, you
might find something...

rows.label: qst002001_msg0102
rows.name:
For her sake, please get
that memento back quickly!

rows.label: qst002001_msg0201
rows.name: You got it back safely!

rows.label: qst002001_msg0202
rows.name:
This collar is a precious
memory of me and her!

rows.label: qst002001_msg0203
rows.name:
Hmm, this collar... it's the one she
wore when she was still alive...

rows.label: qst002001_msg0204
rows.name:
She would lick my cheeks, and I would
be completely smitten... Even now, if
I close my eyes, I can see her...

rows.label: qst002001_msg0205
rows.name: Let's ask a question.

rows.label: qst002001_msg0206
rows.name: Confirm if he's talking about his wife.

rows.label: qst002001_msg0207
rows.name: Ask if it was perhaps his dog.

rows.label: qst002001_msg0208
rows.name:
...Hm?! What on earth
are you talking about?!

rows.label: qst002001_msg0209
rows.name: This collar belonged to my pet!

rows.label: qst002001_msg0210
rows.name:
Why would I put a collar on my wife?!
I would never do such a thing!

rows.label: qst002001_msg0211
rows.name: Goodness, what a misunderstanding...

rows.label: qst002001_msg0212
rows.name: ...Hm? Did I not mention it?

rows.label: qst002001_msg0213
rows.name: This collar belonged to my dog, Lloyd.

rows.label: qst002001_msg0214
rows.name:
How nostalgic... the days we ran
through the fields together.

rows.label: qst002001_msg0215
rows.name: Oops, I got lost in my memories again.

rows.label: qst002001_msg0216
rows.name:
Dear me. I'm getting
sentimental in my old age.

rows.label: qst002001_msg0217
rows.name:
Well, you've been a great help.
This is for you, please take it.
